node.name: CallGraph Viewer
node.shortdescription:
CallGraph:
A graphical explorer for call and class hierarchies. Designed to help understand complex relations in larger scale applications.

Implemented as a view plugin for Eclipse. Leverages the internal platform Call Hierarchy and Search mechanisms. Uses Zest to display a graphical representation of the caller/callee relations between methods (including constructors and internal classes) and super/subclass relations between classes and interfaces.
node.body:
CallGraph:
A graphical explorer for call and class hierarchies. Designed to help understand complex relations in larger scale applications.

Implemented as a view plugin for Eclipse. Leverages the internal platform Call Hierarchy and Search mechanisms. Uses Zest to display a graphical representation of the caller/callee relations between methods (including constructors and internal classes) and super/subclass relations between classes and interfaces.
